"Great job, Professor!":
"Today we have seen the real Hostile
for the first time and it was more than
I have imagined!"

"Your movement to stop Garongo
simply by attacking its weakness...
was very impressive!"

"We have achieved the target this time!
Thank you very much for your company,
Professor!"

"今日、はじめて本物のエネミーを
みましたが、想像以上でした！"

"そしてガロンゴの弱点を軽やかに
仕留めていく先生の動き……
とにかく凄すぎです！"

"これにて今回の目標達成です！
先生、お付き合いいただき
ありがとうございました！"
